channel.title: Angular on Stefanos Vardalos
channel.description: Recent content in Angular on Stefanos Vardalos

item.title: firstpost
item.description: Angular JS Project This is a basic boilerplate to kickstart your next Angular 1.x project, along with some useful tools. Includes Basic Node.JS server Angular App Folder Structure Widely Used Dependencies angular-ui-bootstrap angular-ui-router bootstrap font-awesome Widely Used Developer Dependencies dgeni eslint gulp jasmine-core karma Unit Testing Suite ( Karma and Jasmine ) Coverage Tool Linter Tool ( EsLint ) Documentation Generator ( Dgeni ) Installation Prerequisites Install Node.
